caption: An extremely cool, biology/steampunk carousel on the south side of Jardin Des Plantes. Reasonable prices (eg 8 rides for 10euro) though the rides are fairly short and only half the seats move. All the animals to ride on are either extinct or endangered and there is a explanatory board in French about the featured animals. A cheerful guy runs it and there is coffee and snacks at the caisse.
Very cool, detailed to the max and enjoyful too see people ride it!
Found thanks to Atlas Obscura. It‚Äôs a quirkily little carousel.
Great little piece of history and one of a kind. A learning experience as well as a ride.

This carousel was installed in 1992 at the inspiration of a scientist in comparative anatomy in the adjacent natural history museum. Riders can climb aboard the back of such vanished creatures as the thylacine, the dodo, the aepyornis (a massive creature known as the "elephant bird"), the Barbary lion, the horned turtle, and the sivatherium (a type of early giraffe). There are also endangered animals like the panda and the gorilla mingled in the herd.
A really cute French "Man√®ge" with very special design and atmosphere, love it!
Great
Adorable

Carousel

Magnificent old-fashioned carousel, an institution of the botanical garden for more than 30 years. The panda is perfect for little ones (by staying close) and the ostrich is the pride of older children More attractive prices if you buy tickets in batches of 5, 10 or 20 (cash payment only) Times subject to variation, particularly if the weather is bad. Home without problems since always

The man present there is absolutely odious, does not take the bank card and dares to say loud and clear that he only wants cash, otherwise ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt earn anything‚Äù according to what he says! Behavior with children present on site totally inappropriate, should consider professional retraining. I plan to report it to Paris town hall, we are in a public garden, it‚Äôs scandalous

If you notice that the gentleman has no smile, that he has no polite words, that the ride is closed during opening hours, all this is normal... In short, there will be all kinds of unpleasant situations here. It's a shame that it's such an unfriendly gentleman who runs this ride. A 3 euro ticket is not really cheap. The ride itself has character and is all about the animals.
Great ride with magnificent animals, the man is very pleasant, don't hesitate to go there.
I put 3 only for the two women who sometimes show attendance. On the other hand, -2 for the extremely unpleasant gentleman who closes the ride at 4:45 p.m. instead of 5:15 p.m. as indicated.

Update your opening hours on Google please... This is the 2nd time we've come between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. expressly for you and it's not open!!!! Really painful and a shame because the ride is super fun for children...

Staff with no business sense. Do not apply the decreasing package on the pretext that I had already paid for a ride. Too bad it doesn't make you want to come back. The ride is very nice but save your money for nicer people

It‚Äôs a magnificent ride in the heart of the plant garden. The children have a lot of fun there. I like the original side of animals that are now extinct. I am removing one star because I witnessed an altercation between the owner and a customer (elderly) who had brought her grandson in before buying him a ticket. Even if the owner was right, there are ways of saying things and you can explain the rules without being unpleasant and aggressive, especially with an elderly person and in front of all the children.
My daughter is his. Cousin had fun knowing that when I was little, my grandparents would take us there üòò ‚Ä¶
A little expensive for small budgets if you have several children but nice classic ride
My now grown children loved this ride, very well located in the Jardin des Plantes. Good times for children and their parents. Very nice owner. I recommend.
The children are delighted of course, the parents, given the price (2‚Ç¨50) and the very very short duration of the tour are much less so... obviously no tour will be offered to you!
Very cool for kids with lots of shade and a kiosk
Never seen such a lovable character! It‚Äôs a shame because the ride is quite nice even if it‚Äôs ‚Ç¨2.50/a 2 minute ride!
My daughter wanted to go on a merry-go-round. At 12 p.m. the ride was closed we returned at 1:30 p.m. and still closed so I don't know when this ride opens.

The child really enjoyed riding on the carousel. He was simply delighted! And I wanted to ride more and more :) It‚Äôs a pity that the manager (or owner) is such a gloomy and unfriendly man who found it a burden to run the carousel every time.
Perfect, friendly welcome, and prices are affordable. A ride that you don't come across on every street corner in France, I recommend üëå ‚Ä¶
Sales person as unpleasant as possible, you have to change jobs if you don't like children or people, it's still thanks to them that your ride and your services work!
The little one liked it, that's the main thing. 2‚Ç¨50 for a ride... I find it expensive for such a small ride.
Very welcoming staff, the children enjoyed their rides. We will come back to this
Very nice and typical ride! he's out of the ordinary. The setting is perfect and my daughter loved it
Very pretty ride. Too bad the owner is so rude and aggressive. I won't go back there again because of him.
2.5 laps, and we can stay next to the little ones. It's an old-fashioned ride like there aren't many left.
My kids love it! It's time to play after a walk or a museum. Magnificent ride!
my children loved it since there are dinosaurs. I took 20 tickets for 20 euros
A nice place to have fun and eat apples with family and children
1.5 euros per ride. The tours last a long time.  An old-fashioned ride which is the same as the one I knew as a child in the Luxembourg Gardens.
